quote: Bacon is so good by itself that to put it in any other food is an admission of failure. You're basically saying, 'I can't make this other food taste good, so I'll throw in bacon.'
author: Penn Jillette

quote: Big companies are like marching bands. Even if half the band is playing random notes, it still sounds kind of like music. The concealment of failure is built into them.
author: Douglas Coupland

quote: Working hard to fulfill a dream or instinct and learning over time it doesn't work, doesn't mean a career is over and a reputation killed. When a reputation is killed, it's when failure comes as a result of loss of integrity or judgement... breaking of laws.
author: Bob Iger

quote: Performers should really go to the best schools, like Lady Gaga, you know, she went to NYU and had great teachers... It's best to really study your technique as much as you possibly can so you can have a long career instead of a quick one that's a failure.
author: Tony Bennett

quote: Failure will happen. It's a normal part of the startup process.
author: Steve Blank

quote: The most tragic paradox of our time is to be found in the failure of nation-states to recognize the imperatives of internationalism.
author: Earl Warren

quote: Man's sin is in his failure to live what he is. Being the master of the earth, man forgets that he is the servant of God.
author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

quote: Civilization is a failure. We need to think what we can do together in love and peace.
author: Serj Tankian

quote: I grew up in a household where I learned five things from my old man. You know what they were? You're no good. You're a failure. You're not going to amount to anything. Don't trust nobody, and don't tell nobody your business. When I lost to Larry Holmes in 1982, I felt all five of those things smacked me right across the face.
author: Gerry Cooney

quote: Right from my childhood, I have believed in a Supreme Power. I don't know whether it has form, or it is formless. I am a high school dropout. How come life has given me so much? It's not my intelligence, it's not my abilities. This understanding makes me scared even in success. I don't own my success. Neither do I own my failure.
author: Pawan Kalyan

quote: I think failure is nothing more than life's way of nudging you that you are off course. My attitude to failure is not attached to outcome, but in not trying. It is liberating. Most people attach failure to something not working out or how people perceive you. This way, it is about answering to yourself.
author: Sara Blakely

quote: It is a changing world because of the newcomers who keep arriving and who leave us behind. Trying to keep pace with them is doomed to inglorious failure, especially as the pace has quickened so much.
author: Hans Jonas

quote: Without exposure to potential failure, there is no risk.
author: Brennan Manning

quote: Beside every great success are the seeds of enormous failure. In every failure, there's the opportunity seeds of great success. They're not miles apart. So if they're that close together, and if you're really working, you're always gonna have that likelihood that something's not going to work.
author: Peter Guber

quote: We've been conditioned to think that quitting is a failure, a form of failure. How do we know that that's true?
author: Stephen J. Dubner

quote: We all struggle with our failure to communicate and our failure to reach beyond fear to love people.
author: Mira Sorvino

quote: It's not about failure; it's about trying something and risking something for attaining your goal.
author: Carol Alt

quote: Creative risk taking is essential to success in any goal where the stakes are high. Thoughtless risks are destructive, of course, but perhaps even more wasteful is thoughtless caution which prompts inaction and promotes failure to seize opportunity.
author: Gary Ryan Blair

quote: Rather than viewing a brief relapse back to inactivity as a failure, treat it as a challenge and try to get back on track as soon as possible.
author: Jimmy Connors

quote: The difference between a score in the 90s and a century is often reflected as the difference between failure and success. It may be illogical, but in cricket, a century has its own magic.
author: Geoffrey Boycott

quote: In Britain, by contrast, we still think that class plays a part in determining a person's life chances, so we're less inclined to celebrate success and less inclined to condemn failure. The upshot is that it's much easier to be a failure in Britain than it is in America.
author: Toby Young

quote: I was learning the craft; I didn't study writing in school. Rejection was my motivation, and failure is what taught me.
author: Pierce Brown

quote: The one phrase you can use is that success has a thousand fathers, and failure is an orphan.
author: Alan Price

quote: Learning starts with failure; the first failure is the beginning of education.
author: John Hersey

quote: It's how you deal with failure that determines how you achieve success.
author: Charlotte Whitton

quote: You can't please everyone, but I've always felt you cannot ultimately lose if you give everything you try 110%. You'll always learn something useful, even from a failure, that can be applied to the next challenge or project.
author: Mark Ryan

quote: Ambition is the last refuge of the failure.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: The young think that failure is the Siberian end of the line, banishment from all the living, and tend to do what I then did - which was to hide.
author: James A. Baldwin

quote: Destiny: A tyrant's authority for crime and a fool's excuse for failure.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: Crime and bad lives are the measure of a State's failure, all crime in the end is the crime of the community.
author: H. G. Wells

quote: If you've gone into a marriage and you haven't been clear about how you're going to handle money, how you want to raise kids, who is going to work or stay home or what have you, then you've set yourself up for failure.
author: Phil McGraw

quote: I think I've always been somebody, since the deaths of my father and brother, who was afraid to hope. So, I was more prepared for failure and for rejection than for success.
author: Amy Tan

quote: It is often the failure who is the pioneer in new lands, new undertakings, and new forms of expression.
author: Eric Hoffer

quote: A minute's success pays the failure of years.
author: Robert Browning

quote: It would be great to be able to pass on to someone all of the successes, the failures, and the knowledge that one has had. To help someone, avoid all the fire, pain and anxiety would be wonderful.
author: Sylvester Stallone

quote: The draconian spirit that seeks to enhance penalties and to lower the age at which juveniles will be tries as adults, is part of the 'whole cloth' of three strikes. Our failure to address the depair of our inner-city youth is only delayed by our over-confidence in a stance that is 'tougher than thou.'
author: Greg Boyle

quote: The democratic system is challenged by the failure in television because our evening news programmes have gone for an attempt to entertain as much as to inform in the desperate fight for ratings.
author: Walter Cronkite

quote: You don't go into anything contemplating failure, because if you did, you wouldn't make it.
author: Simon Cowell

quote: Translation is the art of failure.
author: Umberto Eco

quote: When I served as prime minister last time, I failed to prioritize my agenda. I was eager to complete everything at once, and ended my administration in failure. After resigning, for six years I traveled across the nation simply to listen.
author: Shinzo Abe

quote: I have experienced failure as a politician and for that very reason, I am ready to give everything for Japan.
author: Shinzo Abe

quote: Failure doesn't exist. It's only a change of direction.
author: Alejandro Jodorowsky

quote: I would replace most foreign aid with a tax credit for businesses to invest. I think U.S. bureaucrats giving foreign bureaucrats money is a guaranteed failure. And we've had about 50 years' experience at failing with foreign aid.
author: Newt Gingrich

quote: Boston has carried the practice of hypocrisy to the n-th degree of refinement, grace, and failure.
author: Lincoln Steffens

quote: I want to swim in both directions at once. Desire success, court failure.
author: Alan Rickman

quote: Sometimes the best gain is to lose.
author: George Herbert

quote: Success is more dangerous than failure, the ripples break over a wider coastline.
author: Graham Greene

quote: Indulging in unrestrained and immoderate laughter is a sign of intemperance, of a want of control over one's emotions, and of failure to repress the soul's frivolity by a stern use of reason.
author: Saint Basil

quote: Every time I act on a fear, I feel disappointed in myself. I have a lot of fear. If I can quit all fear in my life and all guilt, then I tend to be much, much more living up to my standards. I've never seen a person fail if they didn't fear failure.
author: Sebastian Thrun

quote: Everybody is an expert on one thing - that's what I learned in my high school journalism class - and that's, of course, his own life. And everybody deserves to live and have his story told. And if it doesn't seem like an interesting story, then that's the failure of the listener, or the journalist who retells it badly.
author: William T. Vollmann

quote: My biggest failure is 'Metal Gear.' It's my biggest failure and my biggest success.
author: Hideo Kojima

quote: A person who doubts himself is like a man who would enlist in the ranks of his enemies and bear arms against himself. He makes his failure certain by himself being the first person to be convinced of it.
author: Alexandre Dumas

quote: Federal regulations forbid delaying inspections for fracture-critical bridges like the fallen Minneapolis bridge - the kind with a lack of redundancy in design, so that a single failure in a load-bearing part can cause the entire bridge to collapse.
author: Bill Dedman

quote: I find writing very difficult. It's hard and it hurts sometimes, and it's scary because of the fear of failure and the very unpleasant feeling that you may have reached the limit of your abilities.
author: Tony Kushner

quote: We climb to heaven most often on the ruins of our cherished plans, finding our failures were successes.
author: Amos Bronson Alcott

quote: You make mistakes. Mistakes don't make you.
author: Maxwell Maltz

quote: I've achieved everything I've wanted to achieve, so I'm not scared of failure. I never gave up, however bad the injuries got.
author: Darcey Bussell

quote: Risk management systems and controls may discourage or limit certain revenue-generating opportunities. Failure to ensure the independence of these functions from the revenue generators and risk takers has been shown to be dangerous, and this is something for which the board is accountable.
author: Jerome Powell

quote: There's a spectrum of those moments of connection and the moments we fail to connect, going from super-large successes to failures. Success would be love, I guess, and failure could still be love, but the bad side; and loss.
author: Aimee Bender

quote: Failure is always an option.
author: Adam Savage

quote: I think the fall in Eden was ultimately a failure to give thanks.
author: Ann Voskamp

quote: The vast majority of large scale change efforts fail. Which means that the probability that you have actually experienced a failure, and your people know that and are pessimistic, therefore, about trying something again, is very high.
author: John P. Kotter

quote: Twenty million more have Chronic Kidney Disease, where patients experience a gradual deterioration of kidney function, the end result of which is kidney failure.
author: Xavier Becerra

quote: The failure of the system to deal quickly was attributable to Nixon's lying, stonewalling and refusal to come clean. So it took 26 months for the final truth to be known.
author: Bob Woodward

quote: Often the difference between a successful person and a failure is not one has better abilities or ideas, but the courage that one has to bet on one's ideas, to take a calculated risk - and to act.
author: Andre Malraux

quote: Due to the failure of politics, which has become a process of middle-management, art has become one of the last open spaces to question core beliefs and to design a viable future. Art becomes an open space where we can ask fundamental questions about ourselves.
author: Antony Gormley

quote: There are people who say that you can't experiment... That condemns you to failure.
author: Jose Mujica

quote: I was never afraid of failure after that because, I think, coming that close to death you get kissed. With the years, the actual experience of course fades, but the flavor of it doesn't. I just had a real sense of what choice do I have but to live fully?
author: Debra Winger

quote: When I was growing up, Brandy was TV star, reality star, a pop star, a Cover girl, Grammy winner, had her own Brandy doll, and was the first African American to play Disney princess Cinderella. Most importantly, she is a survivor. Many only judge and remember a person's most recent failure.
author: Niecy Nash

quote: It's not a failure if a marriage or partnership ends after a certain number of years. I think, in general, we expect too much of partners. We can't fulfil a person's every single need and, after ten years or so, many relationships wear out. If we were more philosophical about it, we wouldn't try to blame the other person or be bitter.
author: Deborah Moggach

quote: Innovation demands risk-taking - which, in turn, entails redefining failure, stripping away its power to inhibit.
author: Lynne Doughtie

quote: Fear of failure has always been my best motivator.
author: Douglas Wood

quote: War, except in self-defense, is a failure of moral imagination.
author: Bill Moyers

quote: I have a tendency to sabotage relationships; I have a tendency to sabotage everything. Fear of success, fear of failure, fear of being afraid. Useless, good-for-nothing thoughts.
author: Michael Buble

quote: Nothing helps make a leader more approachable than admitting your struggles, screw-ups and behind-the-scenes thinking on hard calls. If the leader makes this a priority, the whole company will be more open and methodical learning from failure.
author: Scott Weiss

quote: There is a no-man's land in our politics: on the one hand, bounded by what we know to be true, and on the other hand, bounded by what the media says is politically correct. And that's where Donald Trump lives. And it's our failure to admit what we all know to be true in the guise of political correctness that fuels the Trump candidacy.
author: Dick Morris

quote: All war represents a failure of diplomacy.
author: Tony Benn

quote: There are a lot of ways to be expressive in life, but I wasn't good at some of them. Music, for instance. I was a distinct failure with the cello. Eventually, my parents sold the cello and bought a vacuum cleaner. The sound in our home improved.
author: Sam Abell

quote: You can't let a failure keep you down, because if you stay down after you fail, you are going to stay down for good.
author: Heidi Roizen

quote: It's difficult because we tend to overrate the pain of failure. We fear it too much. That's research that emerges from psychology. We think it's going to be worse than it really is. And, I think, as we get a bit older, really after we leave school or college, we quickly stop experimenting.
author: Tim Harford

quote: Burnout is grist to the mill. I write every day, for most of the day, so it's just about turning into metaphor whatever's going on in my life, in the world, and in my head. Every nightmare, every moment of grief or joy or failure, is a moment I can convert into cash via words.
author: Grant Morrison

quote: Fear comes in two packages fear of failure, and sometimes, fear of success.
author: Tom Kite

quote: Feeling is the consciousness of the resulting conditions - of success, failure, equilibrium, compromise or balance, in this continuous rivalry of ideas.
author: James Mark Baldwin

quote: Having in my life been bitten by the jaws of both victory and defeat, I must rush to add that success is to failure as butter pecan ice cream is to death.
author: Rupert Holmes

quote: For me, the path of failure exceeded by far the joys of success. My plight was hopeless.
author: Dominick Dunne

quote: I do think the biggest problem newspapers have is loss of trust, and I feel that's a result of failure to speak truth to power.
author: Craig Newmark

quote: Keep in mind that neither success nor failure is ever final.
author: Roger Babson

quote: The reality of most software development is that the consequences of failure are simply nonexistent.
author: Dan Kaminsky

quote: Nothing succeeds, they say, like success. And certainly nothing fails like failure.
author: Margaret Drabble

quote: Success and failure are emotional and physiological experiences. We need to deal with them in a way that is present and calm.
author: Chade-Meng Tan

quote: Failure and its accompanying misery is for the artist his most vital source of creative energy.
author: Montgomery Clift

quote: No man ever achieved worth-while success who did not, at one time or other, find himself with at least one foot hanging well over the brink of failure.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: If Liberia has failed, then, it is no evidence of the failure of the Negro in government. It is merely evidence of the failure of slavery.
author: Carter G. Woodson

quote: A failure is a man who has blundered, but is not able to cash in the experience.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Optimism is a kind of heart stimulant - the digitalis of failure.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: The line between failure and success is so fine that we scarcely know when we pass it: so fine that we are often on the line and do not know it.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Primarily affecting low-information voters and members of the mainstream media, Obama Worship Syndrome attributes impossible capabilities to Obama's political opponents, finds excuses for every Obama failure in everyone around him and praises the president as the finest politician - nay, human being - of our time.
author: Ben Shapiro

quote: There are some defeats more triumphant than victories.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: The wisest of the wise may err.
author: Aeschylus

quote: To establish true self-esteem we must concentrate on our successes and forget about the failures and the negatives in our lives.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: There could be no honor in a sure success, but much might be wrested from a sure defeat.
author: Ann Landers

quote: Ideology, politics and journalism, which luxuriate in failure, are impotent in the face of hope and joy.
author: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: Adam Smith's huge failure was the fact that he did not foresee the industrial revolution.
author: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: While it is important for people to see your promise you must also remember that hope is the keeper of both happiness and disappointment, the father of both progress and failure.
author: Bryant H. McGill

quote: You gotta lose 'em some of the time. When you do, lose 'em right.
author: Casey Stengel

quote: I think that the failure of newspaper competition in a community is a very serious handicap to the dissemination of the knowledge that the citizens need to participate in a democracy.
author: Walter Cronkite

quote: The main failure of education is that it has not prepared people to comprehend matters concerning human destiny.
author: Norman Cousins

quote: If China stood on an equal basis with other nations, she could compete freely with them in the economic field and be able to hold her own without failure. But as soon as foreign nations use political power as a shield for their economic designs, then China is at a loss how to resist or to compete successfully with them.
author: Sun Yat-sen

quote: I think some parents now look at a youngster failing as the final thing. It's a process, and failure is part of the process. I would like it if the teacher and the parents would connect more. I think that used to be, but we're losing a little bit of that right now.
author: Mike Krzyzewski

quote: Failure to accord credit to anyone for what he may have done is a great weakness in any man.
author: William Howard Taft

quote: When my father left us, my mother went back to school immediately. She went to school in the day while we were at school, and she worked at night. She worked very hard to never let someone define her as a victim or a failure.
author: Ginni Rometty

quote: The most irresistible charm of youth is its bubbling enthusiasm. Youth sees no darkness ahead - no defile that has no outlet - it forgets that there is such a thing as failure in the world and believes that mankind has been waiting all these centuries for him to come and be the liberator of truth and energy and beauty.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: The failure of Lehman Brothers demonstrated that liquidity provision by the Federal Reserve would not be sufficient to stop the crisis; substantial fiscal resources were necessary.
author: Ben Bernanke

quote: It is not a disgrace to fail. Failing is one of the greatest arts in the world.
author: Charles Kettering

quote: We need to teach the highly educated man that it is not a disgrace to fail and that he must analyze every failure to find its cause. He must learn how to fail intelligently, for failing is one of the greatest arts in the world.
author: Charles Kettering

quote: If we say we trust in Him, but in reality do not, then God, taking us at our word, lets us see that we do not really confide in Him; and hence failure arises.
author: George Muller

quote: People are afraid of failure - they don't like to work so hard and have people keep saying, 'No.' I think that's what people fear most.
author: Russell Simmons

quote: Successful entrepreneurs find the balance between listening to their inner voice and staying persistent in driving for success - because sometimes success is waiting right across from the transitional bump that's disguised as failure.
author: Naveen Jain

quote: The failure of world leaders to act on the critical issue of global warming is often blamed on economic considerations.
author: David Suzuki

quote: The attributes for entrepreneurs cut both ways. You need the ability to ignore inconvenient facts and see the world as it should be and not as it is. This inspires people to take huge leaps of faith. But this blindness to facts can be a liability, too. The characteristics that help entrepreneurs succeed can also lead to their failure.
author: Eric Ries

quote: In Iraq we must succeed. Failure is not an option.
author: Zbigniew Brzezinski

quote: We have actually experienced in recent months a dramatic demonstration of an unprecedented intelligence failure, perhaps the most significant intelligence failure in the history of the United States.
author: Zbigniew Brzezinski

quote: All human actions are equivalent... and all are on principle doomed to failure.
author: Carl Sandburg

quote: I employ case studies of failure into my courses, emphasizing that they teach us much more than studies of success. It is not that success stories cannot serve as models of good design or as exemplars of creative engineering. They can do that, but they cannot teach us how close to failure they are.
author: Henry Petroski

quote: The paradox is that when we model future designs on past successes, we are inviting failure down the line; when we take into account past failures and anticipate potential new ways in which failure can occur, we are more likely to produce successful designs.
author: Henry Petroski

quote: Many of the familiar little things that we use every day have typically evolved over a period of time to a state of familiarity. They balance form and function, elegance and economy, success and failure in ways that are not only acceptable, but also admirable.
author: Henry Petroski

quote: In fiction workshops, we tend to focus on matters of verisimilitude largely because such issues are so much easier to talk about than the failure of imagination.
author: Tim O'Brien

quote: Most of us spend the first six days of each week sowing wild oats; then we go to church on Sunday and pray for a crop failure.
author: Fred Allen

quote: The more times I was turned down, the more I believed I was getting closer to making it. A lot of people in Korea say that failure is the mother of success, so I believed that more times I failed, the more likely I was to succeed.
author: Rain

quote: I was a diabetic for 16 years, since I was 14. Being that I lost weight, no more diabetes. You don't have to lose your eyesight, cut off your toes, have a stroke, get kidney failure. You just have to lose weight - you know - for most of the diabetes.
author: Fat Joe

quote: If you're the type of person who has to fulfill your dreams, you've gotta be resourceful to make sure you can do it. I came out to California when I was 21, thinking my New York credentials would take me all the way. I came back home a year later all dejected and a failure.
author: Vin Diesel

quote: Failure's a natural part of life.
author: John Malkovich

quote: Lacking the direct test of success or failure, the voter tends to turn, not to those politicians whose measures have the best chance of success, but to those with the ability to 'sell' their propaganda. Without grasping logical chains of deduction, the average voter will never be able to discover the error that the ruler makes.
author: Murray Rothbard

quote: That sense of failure, I don't know where people put it who don't write songs and aren't able to emote physically. It must go somewhere.
author: Sting

quote: As long as there are people in education making excuses for failure, cursing future generations with a culture of low expectations, denying children access to the best that has been thought and written, because Nemo and the Mister Men are more relevant, the battle needs to be joined.
author: Michael Gove

quote: I've had my share of struggle. I believe, never take success to your head or failure to your heart.
author: Randeep Hooda

quote: I've accepted that I was a failure in politics. I was not qualified for the job.
author: Amitabh Bachchan

quote: Most people don't really do too many things because they're afraid they'll fail. There are people failing all the time, all around you. And nobody is going to notice your failure. Your failure is not going to be so spectacular that people write news stories about it. Your failure will be boring.
author: Kumail Nanjiani

quote: By far the most important factor in the success or failure of any school, far more important than tests or standards or business-model methods of accountability, is simply attracting the best-educated, most exciting young people into urban schools and keeping them there.
author: Jonathan Kozol

quote: Growing up, I had the weird fantasy list: I wanted to be Alice Cooper, Steven Spielberg, and Stan Lee. You have to have almost psychotic drive, because you're going to have years of failure.
author: Rob Zombie

quote: We create success or failure on the course primarily by our thoughts.
author: Gary Player

quote: You'll never convince me there is a hopeless situation or there is any finality in any success or any failure.
author: Carlos Ghosn

quote: As an outside; don't worry about failure, because failure will take care of itself. Focus on success.
author: Henry Cavill

quote: The clearest explanation for the failure of any marriage is that the two people are incompatible; that is, that one is male and the other female.
author: Anna Quindlen

quote: You want to ensure people can do it right 99 percent of time. When we have to fire one of our surgical trainees, it is never because they don't have the physical skills but because they don't have the moral skills - to practise and admit failure.
author: Atul Gawande

quote: This is true enough, but success is the next best thing to happiness, and if you can't be happy as a success, it's very unlikely that you would find a deeper, truer happiness in failure.
author: Michael Korda

quote: The freedom to fail is vital if you're going to succeed. Most successful people fail from time to time, and it is a measure of their strength that failure merely propels them into some new attempt at success.
author: Michael Korda

quote: There is failure in every industry; there is failure in every step. It's just that we are working in an industry where everything is just out there; that is why it looks so magnified. But failure is a part of life.
author: Yami Gautam

quote: Even people who despise ego and aspire to humility, who plan to be humble once they are successful, are worried that actually enacting those beliefs would sentence them to a life of obscurity or weakness or failure.
author: Ryan Holiday

quote: People in the business will stay with you through drugs and alcohol and divorces and insanity and everything else, but you have a failure, pal, and they don't want to know nothing about you!
author: Don Johnson

quote: The modern rise of Alzheimer's Disease in the twentieth century is not a sign of failure. It's a sign of success. Success in living long enough to see that disease expressed.
author: S. Jay Olshansky

quote: We know there is no such thing as freedom without the risk of failure.
author: Rick Perry

quote: If you're not a born-again Christian, you're a failure as a human being.
author: Jerry Falwell

quote: Our system provides for a winner to take office on January 20th, and he is expected to take command of the ship of state. Failure to do so, characterized by hesitation and indecision, will harm the national interest.
author: Richard V. Allen

quote: I feel that 'The Great Failure' is really a book written out of great love and a willingness to face all of who a human being is.
author: Natalie Goldberg

quote: There is no such thing as darkness; only a failure to see.
author: Malcolm Muggeridge

quote: I was very afraid of failure because if you fail at something you love, then you ruin what you love.
author: Kimbal Musk

quote: The probability of failure doesn't matter to me.
author: Vinod Khosla

quote: If you have a level of expectation in your life that you have to be a quote-unquote star, whatever that means, you might be setting yourself up for failure.
author: Bryan Cranston

quote: Confidence is contagious, but so is failure. Even the Yankees will lose if you persuade them that they will.
author: Rosabeth Moss Kanter

quote: Mohammed was not an apparent failure. He was a dazzling success, politically as well as spiritually, and Islam went from strength to strength to strength.
author: Karen Armstrong

quote: Ilaiyaraaja is my most favourite music director. His music was my lullaby, his music was my food, his music was my childhood, his music was my first love, his music was my failure, his music was my first kiss, my first love failure, my success... he is in my blood.
author: Dhanush

quote: I constantly experience failure in that my work is never as good as I want it to be. So I live with failure.
author: Jeremy Irons

quote: I failed first grade, which is my biggest problem. You always feel like a failure, like you're stupid.
author: Amy Sedaris

quote: It's your own fear of failure that stops you from doing things.
author: Anupam Kher

quote: Among all the tests President Obama faced in his first term, his biggest failure was climate change.
author: Jeff Goodell

quote: No one suggested Lehman deserved to be saved. But the argument has been made that the crisis might have been less severe if it had been saved, because Lehman's failure created remarkable uncertainty in the market as investors became confused about the role of the government and whether it was picking winners and losers.
author: Andrew Ross Sorkin

quote: I think to visualize failure as you're starting off is really a bad thing to do.
author: Marcia Gay Harden

quote: We are feeble, weak and impoverished because of our failure to pray. God is restrained in doing because we are restrained by reason of our non-praying. All failures in securing heaven are traceable to lack of prayer or misdirected petition.
author: Edward McKendree Bounds

quote: I don't know if it's a failure of imagination on my part, but I'm not going to be writing about Paris in the 1800s. I feel like it would come off as just ludicrously uninformed, even if I did a lot of research.
author: Maria Semple

quote: I've always embraced failure as a noble pursuit. It allows you to be anti whatever anyone wants you to be, and to break all the rules.
author: Malcolm Mclaren

quote: There is no such thing as disappointment for those who continue to cherish the selflessness of which is born the noblest inner self. There is no such thing as failure for those who invest in the potentialities of the Ideal of the Soul.
author: Ameen Rihani

quote: I've had great success and I've had catastrophic failure. It's really how you handle the rough stuff that defines you, I think.
author: Peter Berg

quote: A failure doesn't mean you are unworthy, nor does it preclude success on the next try.
author: Leonard Mlodinow

quote: I'm not scared of anything in particular, but I am motivated by a fear of failure as opposed to a need to succeed.
author: Heston Blumenthal

quote: The failure of national economic policy is costing us more than jobs; it has begun to weaken that uniquely American spirit of risk-taking, large ambition, and optimism about the future. We must rally them now to bold departures that rebuild our national morale as well as our material prosperity.
author: Mitch Daniels

quote: My great fear has always been complete and utter failure. Hence, you see, all the dispossessed people in my fiction, and why I try to earn as much money as I can. It's a defense. I don't enjoy it or do anything with it.
author: Peter Ackroyd

quote: When we're in game worlds, I believe that many of us become the best version of ourselves: the most likely to help at a moment's notice. The most likely to stick with a problem as long as it takes. To get up after failure and try again.
author: Jane McGonigal

quote: Bitcoin is a peer-to-peer, decentralized form of money, as durable as the Internet itself. Remember, the Internet - or DARPA, as it was originally called - was created as a fail-safe, global network with no 'single point of failure.' If one part goes down, data takes another route, and nothing is lost.
author: Max Keiser

quote: When an action is once done, it is right or wrong for ever; no accidental failure of its good or evil fruits can possibly alter that.
author: William Kingdon Clifford

quote: Educational institutes can no longer be prizes in church politics or furnish berths for failure in other walks of life.
author: E. Franklin Frazier

quote: I'm finding that success is way more time-consuming than failure ever was.
author: Emma Donoghue

quote: If I didn't have children, I think my life would be a failure.
author: Yann Martel

quote: The pressures are intense, because the rewards for success and the penalty for failure are more and more.
author: Alan Hansen

quote: Poverty leads to hardship and failure.
author: Irwin Redlener

quote: I love failure. It's stuff that I'm thinking about all the time in my life, so it would make sense to me anyway to write about it.
author: Loudon Wainwright III

quote: Do not wallow in your failure. Spend some time grieving, learn from it, and then move on. Constantly replaying what went wrong will not benefit you. Get involved in another company, another cause, another relationship.
author: Julie Wainwright

quote: Failure is ultimately very liberating. Once you come out the other side of it, you just might have faced one of your biggest fears and lived. The other side of failure is a big elimination of fear of failure. Trust me, that is an amazing gift.
author: Julie Wainwright

quote: In a sense it might even be said that our failure is to form habits: for, after all, habit is relative to a stereotyped world, and meantime it is only the roughness of the eye that makes two persons, things, situations, seem alike.
author: Walter Pater

quote: One of the biggest problems with the modern feminist movement is its failure to bring men along with us.
author: Tammy Bruce

quote: The greatest failure is that although we have created institutions, we have not created a civil society.
author: Paddy Ashdown

quote: One thing I do believe is I'm a believer in the presence of God. I believe that God is close. Whether it's in joy, pain or personal failure, I believe that God is close. That much I feel in my life.
author: David Gregory

quote: In God's world, for those who are in earnest, there is no failure. No work truly done, no word earnestly spoken, no sacrifice freely made, was ever made in vain.
author: Frederick William Robertson

quote: No failure in America, whether of love or money, is ever simple; it is always a kind of betrayal, of a mass of shadowy, shared hopes.
author: Greil Marcus

quote: I liked drawing and painting, because the only failure would be to listen to the doubters who wanted me to stop drawing and painting because 'you aren't going to make a living doing that.' I liked looking in art books at the work of painters.
author: Billy Childish

quote: At the heart of the failure of most plays is the inability to carry on a thoughtful conversation about your work with yourself.
author: Marsha Norman

quote: If the whole process of learning from failure means discarding stuff that's not working, but in fact, our natural reaction is to keep going, to throw more money behind it, to throw more emotional energy behind it... that's a real problem.
author: Tim Harford

quote: Failure's inevitable. It happens all the time in a complex economy. And how did the economy produce all these amazing things that we have around us, computers and cell phones and so on? Well, the process was trial and error. There were a bunch of ideas, and the good ones grew and prospered, and the bad ones were pretty ruthlessly weeded out.
author: Tim Harford

quote: 'The White Woman on the Green Bicycle' is a love story mapped onto an unfolding political tragedy: that of the failure of the Independence era in Trinidad.
author: Monique Roffey

quote: To begin to think with purpose, is to enter the ranks of those strong ones who only recognize failure as one of the pathways to attainment.
author: James Lane Allen

quote: The only person who needs to know about failure is yourself.
author: John Connolly

quote: Failure is a word that I simply don't accept.
author: John H. Johnson

quote: Escapism, we are led to believe, is evidence of a deficiency in character, a certain failure of temperament, and like so many -isms, it is to be strenuously avoided. 'How do you expect to get ahead?,' people ask. But the question altogether misses the point. The escapist doesn't want to get ahead. He simply wants to get away.
author: J. Maarten Troost

quote: It is wise to keep in mind that neither success nor failure is ever final.
author: Roger Babson

quote: Spend enough time around success and failure, and you learn a reverence for possibility.
author: Dale Dauten

quote: Never permit failure to become a habit.
author: William Frederick Book

quote: The main reason for the failure of the modern medical science is that it is dealing with results and not causes. Nothing more than the patching up of those attacked and the burying of those who are slain, without a thought being given to the real strong hold.
author: Edward Bach

quote: Ignorance is the failure to discriminate between the permanent and the impermanent, the pure and the impure, bliss and suffering, the Self and the non-Self.
author: Patanjali

quote: Success without someone to share it with is hollow indeed. On the other hand, it beats the heck out of failure.
author: Judith McNaught

quote: The fact that we are here today to debate raising America's debt limit is a sign of leadership failure. America has a debt problem and a failure of leadership. Americans deserve better. I, therefore, intend to oppose the effort to increase America's debt.
author: Barack Obama

quote: The Bush Administration's failure to be consistently involved in helping Israel achieve peace with the Palestinians has been both wrong for our friendship with Israel, as well as badly damaging to our standing in the Arab world.
author: Barack Obama

quote: So while I will never minimize the costs involved in military action, I am convinced that a failure to act in Libya would have carried a far greater price for America.
author: Barack Obama

quote: My reputation grows with every failure.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: I'm hopeful. I know there is a lot of ambition in Washington, obviously. But I hope the ambitious realize that they are more likely to succeed with success as opposed to failure.
author: George W. Bush

quote: Most organizations don't fall apart as a result of one big blow. Most relationships don't end because of one grand argument. Most lives don't fall to pieces due to one sad event. No, I suggest to you that sustained failure happens as the consequence of small, daily acts of neglect that stack up over time to lead to a blow up - and break down.
author: Robin S. Sharma

quote: True, foolish risks can lead to difficult consequences. But having said that, don't be so scared of failure and disappointment that you fail to dream.
author: Robin S. Sharma

quote: So many amongst us live in the past rather than loving the present and building a brilliant future. Some people stay stuck for years over something they did or a failure they've experienced. Sad. A life is a terrible thing to waste.
author: Robin S. Sharma

quote: There are many victories worse than a defeat.
author: George Eliot

quote: The only failure one should fear, is not hugging to the purpose they see as best.
author: George Eliot

quote: In politics, what begins in fear usually ends in failure.
author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: If we don't succeed, we run the risk of failure.
author: Al Gore

quote: War remains the decisive human failure.
author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quote: I have always been pushed by the negative. The apparent failure of a play sends me back to my typewriter that very night, before the reviews are out. I am more compelled to get back to work than if I had a success.
author: Tennessee Williams

quote: I've never been a jealous person, and I've never felt built up by someone else's failure - that's a cheap thrill.
author: Matthew McConaughey

quote: I fear that our true motivation is about oil and our own flailing economy; about the failure to destroy Al Qaeda and about revenge.
author: Dave Matthews

quote: By the time I was a young man, I lived with two deep struggles: I longed to become a cricketer, and I performed miserably in school. Cricket and tennis were all that I lived for. In India, this was a formula for failure.
author: Ravi Zacharias

quote: I don't understand a way to work other than bold-facedly running towards failure.
author: Cate Blanchett

quote: Already from your own cells scientists can grow skin, cartilage, noses, blood vessels, bladders and windpipes. In the future, scientists will grow more complex organs, like livers and kidneys. The phrase 'organ failure' will disappear.
author: Michio Kaku

quote: Any critic is entitled to wrong judgments, of course. But certain lapses of judgment indicate the radical failure of an entire sensibility.
author: Susan Sontag

quote: There is no loneliness greater than the loneliness of a failure. The failure is a stranger in his own house.
author: Eric Hoffer

quote: Pride is ugly. It says, 'If you succeed, I am a failure.'
author: Ezra Taft Benson

quote: I think that a failure of statistical thinking is the major intellectual shortcoming of our universities, journalism and intellectual culture.
author: Steven Pinker

quote: The idea of capitalism is not just success but also the failure that allows success to happen.
author: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: The Communist bloc of old was a study in the failure of failure. Losers in the Soviet economy were the people at the end of the long lines for consumer goods. Worse losers were the people who had spent hours getting to the head of the line, only to be told that the goods were unavailable.
author: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: Do not let your ambitions become a sanctuary for your failures.
author: Bryant H. McGill

quote: The very nature of finance is that it cannot be profitable unless it is significantly leveraged... and as long as there is debt, there can be failure and contagion.
author: Alan Greenspan

quote: No experience is a cause of success or failure. We do not suffer from the shock of our experiences, so-called trauma - but we make out of them just what suits our purposes.
author: Alfred Adler

quote: In 1999, I was in St. Louis with Martin Luther King III as we led protests against the state's failure to hire minority contractors for highway construction projects. We went at dawn on a summer day with over a thousand people and performed acts of civil disobedience.
author: Al Sharpton

quote: President Obama's astonishing failure to secure an orderly transition in Iraq has unnecessarily put at risk the victories that were won through the blood and sacrifice of thousands of American men and women.
author: Mitt Romney

quote: Your ability to adapt to failure, and navigate your way out of it, absolutely 100 percent makes you who you are.
author: Viola Davis

quote: I felt a failure because I couldn't sustain myself from what I earned from my writing. My day jobs were what mattered, and it was hard to even get those because universities wouldn't hire me as a real writer.
author: Sandra Cisneros

quote: What America does best is produce the ability to accept failure.
author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quote: I don't lose any sleep at night over the potential for failure. I cannot even spell the word.
author: James Mattis

quote: Ambitious failure, magnificent failure, is a very good thing.
author: Guy Kawasaki

quote: Different parts of the world have different attitudes to failure. Arguably, it may take more courage to be an entrepreneur in Sydney, or Paris, or London, or Japan, or Singapore... but an entrepreneur sees the world for what it could be, not what it is.
author: Guy Kawasaki

quote: Revolutionaries were depressed and close to emotional breakdown; after the failure, they left successively.
author: Sun Yat-sen

quote: I've tried to handle winning well, so that maybe we'll win again, but I've also tried to handle failure well. If those serve as good examples for teachers and kids, then I hope that would be a contribution I have made to sport. Not just basketball, but to sport.
author: Mike Krzyzewski

quote: I believe in trusting men, not only once but twice - in giving a failure another chance.
author: James Cash Penney

quote: Heaven knows that I have done all that a mortal could do, to save the people, and the failure was not my fault, but the fault of others.
author: Davy Crockett

quote: My biggest fear is doing the same things 10 years from now. That would be a failure. It's something you have to constantly reassess, and asking yourself what you are going to do next makes it a good, long full journey.
author: George Clooney

quote: No matter how vast, how total, the failure of man here on earth, the work of man will be resumed elsewhere. War leaders talk of resuming operations on this front and that, but man's front embraces the whole universe.
author: Henry Miller

quote: Obama's failure to close Guantanamo is yet another instance where the rhetoric of democratic and constitutional rights proved not useful for his international relations, relations which are always pursued in ways that continue to link and fortify securitarian power with the opening of new markets.
author: Judith Butler

quote: My feeling, based on my own experience, is that aiming for grandiosity is the fastest route to failure.
author: James Altucher

quote: Given the extent of the exposures of major banks around the world to A.I.G., and in light of the extreme fragility of the system, there was a significant risk that A.I.G.'s failure could have sparked a global banking panic.
author: Ben Bernanke

quote: In the future, financial firms of any type whose failure would pose a systemic risk must accept especially close regulatory scrutiny of their risk-taking.
author: Ben Bernanke

quote: Failure to take note of the fact that the character of twentieth-century humanity differs from that of humanity in the fifteenth century, let alone before and at the time of the Mystery of Golgotha, is to sleep through the process of world evolution.
author: Rudolf Steiner

quote: I think my whole life, because of where I came from, I had a fear of failure.
author: Howard Schultz

quote: A hatred of failure has always been part of my nature.
author: J. Paul Getty

quote: I buy a lot of cookbooks. Some of them you just kind of read, and you try one recipe, and it doesn't really work. So then you don't go back to it. The new Ina Garten cookbook, which is called 'Back to Basics,' I have not had a failure with. It is the most fantastic cookbook. I think I bought 20 copies of it for friends.
author: Nora Ephron

quote: Cheerfully fessing up to our failures turns crazy mind off, humility and compassion on. I learned this in a karate dojo that had a strange tradition. Everyone there loved recounting failure stories, and after an evening of smacking one another, we'd sit and have a beer while the students swapped tales of martial arts disaster.
author: Martha Beck

quote: Greatly begin. Though thou have time, but for a line, be that sublime. Not failure, but low aim is crime.
author: James Russell Lowell

quote: A joke is a way to say, 'I'm going to do something funny now. If I don't get a laugh at the end, I'm a failure.'
author: Penn Jillette

quote: I feel to invite women everywhere to rise to the great potential within you. I do not ask that you reach beyond your capacity. I hope you will not nag yourselves with thoughts of failure. I hope you will not try to set goals far beyond your capacity to achieve. I hope you will simply do what you can do in the best way you know.
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: It's impossible for a Democrat to be a failure. It's impossible for a Democrat to be a reprobate. It's impossible for a Democrat to be a mess. It just isn't possible, as far as the mind-set of the media is concerned.
author: Rush Limbaugh

quote: I read less and less. I have not forgiven books for their failure to tell me the truth and make me happy.
author: Mason Cooley

quote: We have to provide more visibility, more certainty to the investors and reduce the cost of failure.
author: Emmanuel Macron

quote: One of the things I definitely think of as a driver of me is fear. And it's fear of failure, fear of being overtaken.
author: Jocko Willink

quote: If you get into a Broadway show and it doesn't work, you're a failure. And if it does work, you may be stuck for who knows how long. It just doesn't sound great to me!
author: Betty White

quote: There is no question that the Islamic State will be defeated in Mosul; the real question is what comes afterward. Can the post-Islamic State effort resolve the squabbling likely to arise over numerous issues and bring lasting stability to one of Iraq's most diverse and challenging provinces? Failure to do so could lead to ISIS 3.0.
author: David Petraeus

quote: Iraq's Sunnis need to be brought back into the fold. They need to feel as though they have a stake in the success of Iraq rather than a stake in its failure.
author: David Petraeus

quote: George W. Bush is history's president, a man for whom the long-term success or failure of democracy in Iraq will determine his place in history.
author: Andrew Breitbart

quote: I was raised in the '70s, and I've worked with people I love, and I've been on sets with my parents, with people who run a set and require of actors a sense of liberty and freedom and exploration and failure into brave achievement.
author: Laura Dern

quote: We decided to try in vitro, because both Peter and I felt we couldn't handle another failure. When I miscarried after that, we had to come to terms with the possibility that this wasn't meant to be.
author: Christie Brinkley

quote: If I were not African, I wonder whether it would be clear to me that Africa is a place where the people do not need limp gifts of fish but sturdy fishing rods and fair access to the pond. I wonder whether I would realize that while African nations have a failure of leadership, they also have dynamic people with agency and voices.
author: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie

quote: I don't look at football as a violent, barbaric sport. It's a very spiritual sport, especially for someone facing the challenges during a game: the fear of failure, the fear of getting too big an ego, of making a mistake and everybody criticizing you.
author: Troy Polamalu

quote: I think I'm less afraid of failure than some others.
author: Russell Simmons

quote: A lot of suffering is just getting rid of dross in yourself, and lingering and hanging in the darkness is often - I say this against myself - a failure of imagination, to imagine the door into the light.
author: John O'Donohue

quote: Ultimately, all human activities have as their goal the realization of happiness. Why, then, have we ended up producing the opposite result? Could the underlying cause be our failure to correctly understand the true nature of happiness?
author: Daisaku Ikeda

quote: Movies are not novels, and that's why, when filmmakers try to adapt novels, particularly long or complex novels, the result is almost always failure. It can't be done.
author: Paul Auster

quote: The only TV I would be interested in exploring would be live television. There's no substitute for a team of artists performing at their peak live when failure is possible. It's a high-wire act. That excites me.
author: Francis Ford Coppola

quote: The great question is not whether you have failed, but whether you are content with failure.
author: Laurence J. Peter

quote: I realized that I was afraid to really, really try something, 100%, because I had never reached true failure.
author: Trent Reznor

quote: Sometimes failure isn't an opportunity in disguise, it's just you.
author: Douglas Coupland

quote: Failure is authentic, and because it's authentic, it's real and genuine, and because of that, it's a pure state of being.
author: Douglas Coupland

quote: In the business world today, failure is apparently not an option. We need to change this attitude toward failure - and celebrate the idea that only by falling on our collective business faces do we learn enough to succeed down the road.
author: Naveen Jain

quote: When you experience a failure as a leader, don't hide it - talk about it. Your missed opportunity will encourage others to take risks.
author: Naveen Jain

quote: How important is failure - yes, failure - to the health of a thriving, innovative business? So important that Ratan Tata, chairman of India's largest corporation, gives an annual award to the employee who comes up with the best idea that failed.
author: Naveen Jain

quote: Call it the Tiger Mom effect: In the business world today, failure is apparently not an option.
author: Naveen Jain

quote: Sometimes we never see what failure is and often fail to recognize it.
author: Naveen Jain

quote: If my child had prejudice in his head, I'd be ashamed. I would see it as my failure as a parent.
author: Salman Rushdie

quote: I feel that marriage can lead to the ultimate rejection and failure and divorce and things we all fear.
author: Mike Birbiglia

quote: What I try to get physically healthy people to understand is that they're going to die someday. There is no way out. And dying isn't failure, but not living is, so make use of your time. Don't keeping waiting.
author: Bernie Siegel

quote: If anyone has seen success and failure on a global stage, it's my friend Steve Forbes.
author: Peter Diamandis

quote: You just don't go out when you're over 55 years of age, have a colossal failure, and expect to find work in your field again.
author: Roger Ailes

quote: About the only problem with success is that it does not teach you how to deal with failure.
author: Tommy Lasorda

quote: There's a difference between a failure and a fiasco... a fiasco is a disaster of mythic proportions.
author: Orlando Bloom

quote: I looked long and carefully at the picture of a stag painted by Landseer - the style was good, and the brush was handled with fine effect; but he fails in copying Nature, without which the best work will be a failure.
author: John James Audubon

quote: I know it wouldn't seem like I've had a lot of failure in my career, but there are things that I regard as failures, when I look at certain performances and go, 'That's not good enough.'
author: Daniel Radcliffe

quote: I always feel like a vague failure in L.A. - it always makes me feel like I should somehow be different than I am. And I don't know why.
author: Greta Gerwig

quote: In reality, I am more a professor, one who reflects and mediates on spiritual questions. Practical governance is not my strong point, and this is certainly a weakness. But I do not see myself as a failure. For eight years, I carried out my work.
author: Pope Benedict XVI

quote: You always pass failure on your way to success.
author: Mickey Rooney

quote: The historic lesson is that it was a strategic failure to go into Iraq. History will not be and should not be kind with that decision.
author: Michael T. Flynn

quote: One of the arguments I make for the failure of the euro is that, at the time it was being constructed, there was a 'neo-liberal' ideology which said that all we need to do to make this thing work is to get deficits low, keep inflation low, and take down barriers, and then everything would be fine.
author: Joseph Stiglitz

quote: Failure is more frequently from want of energy than want of capital.
author: Daniel Webster

quote: It's probably foolish to expect relationships to go on forever and to say that because something only lasts 10 years, it's a failure.
author: James Taylor

quote: Because of the failure of the federal government to enforce federal law, we now have 'banks too big to fail,' unregulated Internet monopoly, and the evisceration of a dispersed and independent media.
author: Paul Craig Roberts

quote: The offshoring of American jobs by global corporations and the deregulation of the U.S. financial system have resulted in American economic failure.
author: Paul Craig Roberts

quote: Anybody who dies with money in the bank is a failure.
author: Dan Gilbert

quote: The terror of failure can make you feel like a failure. So a bunch of people think you're not very good at your thing. How much do you invest in what they say? How much do you care? Failure is not putting yourself on the line.
author: Dylan Moran

quote: The person interested in success has to learn to view failure as a healthy, inevitable part of the process of getting to the top.
author: Joyce Brothers

quote: By virtually any measure, the record of the Republican Majority is an appalling failure.
author: Sheila Jackson Lee

quote: Military leaders, many of whom were students of counterinsurgency, recognized the dangers of an incremental escalation and the historical lesson that 'trailing' an insurgency typically condemned counterinsurgents to failure.
author: Stanley A. McChrystal

quote: A life which does not go into action is a failure.
author: Arnold J. Toynbee

quote: If those committed to the quest fail, they will be forgiven. When lost, they will find another way. The moral imperative of humanism is the endeavor alone, whether successful or not, provided the effort is honorable and failure memorable.
author: E. O. Wilson

quote: Low standards are a tactic that takes pressure off teachers' unions by accepting mediocrity and failure for kids.
author: Jeb Bush

quote: Because of my intense hopes for the youth of China, I feel very keenly my responsibility for their future success or failure. The fate of China lies in their hands. The responsibility for organizing and training them to become worthy citizens of China, able to undertake the tasks of Resistance and Reconstruction, is mine; I cannot evade it.
author: Chiang Kai-shek

quote: I lived with this tremendous fear of failure because my father was a playwright and a director, and I think he did a couple of things as a child as an actor as well, and he... he failed, basically.
author: Ben Affleck

quote: Admitting failure is quite cleansing, but never - pleasurable.
author: Michael Morpurgo

quote: Divorce is so common and accepted in America that beating myself up over it may sound ridiculous. But I was raised to believe that divorce wasn't an option; to me, divorce equaled failure. I wasn't able to change that equation until I found myself in the right relationship.
author: Trisha Yearwood

quote: I think that big, sort of theatrical relaunches tend to set you up for failure and hype.
author: Tina Brown

quote: Failure has gone to his head.
author: Wilson Mizner

quote: Katie Price is no exception. She, too, is - in a distinctive way - a philosopher. Partially, Katie Price's philosophy is one of extraordinary confidence. She is remarkable not for her looks or antics but because of her tremendous self-assurance and her unwillingness to be intimidated by criticism or failure.
author: Alain de Botton

quote: I'm drawn to failure. I feel like I'm contending with it constantly in my own life.
author: Joyce Carol Oates

quote: The Bay of Pigs became a metaphor for feckless folly and failure.
author: Pat Buchanan

quote: Case studies of failure should be made a part of the vocabulary of every engineer so that he or she can recall or recite them when something in a new design or design process is suggestive of what went wrong in the case study.
author: Henry Petroski

quote: Relying on nothing but scientific knowledge to produce an engineering solution is to invite frustration at best and failure at worst.
author: Henry Petroski

quote: People think when you have a, quote, 'bank failure,' that that is the end of the bank. And it isn't necessarily.
author: Michele Bachmann

quote: I like to do matrices. One option per line, different facets for each column. Salary, location, happiness index, failure index, and all that.
author: Marissa Mayer

quote: I like the possibility of failure. I don't want to be in a comfortable zone.
author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu

quote: The failure of Obamacare, I think, rests solely on the shoulders of Democrats. They created the program. They pushed it through. They made this legislation happen, and they need to own the failure of it.
author: Sarah Huckabee Sanders

quote: I mean, I love L.A. - I love living here. But I wish that we could make things without the need to hit a home run every single time. It's a unique thing to Hollywood that if you don't do that every time, then you're considered a failure. But it's like, 'Well, are you making movies to be successful? Or are you making movies to learn something?'
author: Kristen Stewart

quote: My biggest failure is I have too many to talk about.
author: Dean Kamen

quote: Get used to dealing with failure as long as it doesn't hurt people around you, as long as it doesn't hurt you physically, or it doesn't hurt you so much that you can't pick yourself up.
author: Dean Kamen

quote: The dumb-manager theory of business problems just didn't hold water for me. There had to be a deeper reason why smart people would make decisions that lead to failure.
author: Clayton M. Christensen

quote: I have tried every diet to lose weight. When you restrict yourself, you're setting yourself up for failure.
author: Octavia Spencer

quote: While I've had plenty of ups and downs, dealt with my share of failure, and struggled through emotionally difficult periods, I'm fundamentally an optimist.
author: Brad Feld

quote: My work ethic came from my parents and my fear of failure. I came from a small, predominantly black school and I didn't want to let them down.
author: Jerry Rice

quote: Government doesn't have a high tolerance for failure.
author: John Hickenlooper

quote: The failure to set standards for Palestinian conduct hurts the cause of peace.
author: Elliott Abrams

quote: Once you can accept failure, you can have fun and success.
author: Rickey Henderson

quote: It's very important to learn quick lessons from your failures, very important to recognize symptoms of failure pretty early, and it is very, very important to not to be attached too much to the idea - you have to know when to give up an idea.
author: N. R. Narayana Murthy

quote: Failure sometimes enlarges the spirit. You have to fall back upon humanity and God.
author: Charles Horton Cooley

quote: As soon as I did my first five minutes of stand-up I knew that I would rather be a failure at comedy than a success in marketing.
author: Jimmy Carr

quote: It is easier to win than to fail. Everybody sides with the winner. But the failure walks alone.
author: George Matthew Adams

quote: In Chicago, you have an absence of strong family units, and that absence gets filled by gangs. You have a failure in the school system, after-school programs and other social programs to help keep kids off the streets. Amnesty International speaks to that in some way, by keeping these issues in the forefront.
author: Lupe Fiasco

quote: While 'The Owner's Manual' is not a formula for guaranteed success by any means, we're confident it will help reduce the failure rate of most startups that use our Customer Development process.
author: Steve Blank

quote: In corporations, the penalty for repeated failure on known tasks is being reassigned to other tasks or asked to leave the company.
author: Steve Blank

quote: As a small business owner, you may not have the luxury to throw good money after bad, but if you can ascertain the 'why' of the failure, you can draw some significance from it and then turn it into something that clients will buy.
author: Michael E. Gerber

quote: At some point, you have to declare an idea dead and, if not a failure, then at least not a success.
author: Michael E. Gerber

quote: Those who refuse to liberalise and globalise are doomed to failure.
author: Yuval Noah Harari

quote: This is the paradox for me: in failure alone is there any possibility of success. I don't think I'm alone in this - nor do I think it's an attitude that only prevails among people whose work is obviously 'creative'.
author: Will Self

quote: Young professionals shouldn't have to let a fear of failure hold them back; they should feel emboldened to take on challenges in creative ways.
author: Cathy Engelbert

quote: In addition to encouraging failure, I would also encourage companies to broadly create a culture of innovation. That should mean more than just technology and invention; it should mean something millennials know well: Ingenuity.
author: Cathy Engelbert

quote: While the public school rewards failure by throwing more government money at failing school systems, the voucher system does the opposite.
author: Fabrizio Moreira

quote: Every entrepreneur knows how agonizingly difficult it is to make the decision to give it your all, knowing that failure is inevitable; the successful ones know that the only way to get back up is through learning from that failure.
author: Fabrizio Moreira

quote: There are a whole host of psychological phenomenon humans have developed to protect ourselves from the sting of failure, from holding ourselves less accountable for our failures than we do other people, to letting our fear paralyze us and keep us from even trying.
author: Fabrizio Moreira

quote: It is incredibly important to set goals for your business, as if you have no direction for your business, your online business will be a failure.
author: Fabrizio Moreira

quote: When you say 'failure,' that seems really dramatic, but a lot of failure is just really depressing and mundane. I remember the first time I ever played a concert in Italy. I played a venue that held 900 people, and I think five people showed up. It wasn't a big, 'John Carter of Mars' type failure. It wasn't dramatic; it was just depressing.
author: Moby

quote: The failure to work out sensible budgets makes it impossible for government agencies to make long-term plans, and instead leaves them scrambling to spend money in the short term.
author: Matt Taibbi

quote: I felt like a failure for so long because I wasn't able to access myself in the way I knew I would have if I was going to make music that mattered. I knew I was going to have to learn how to be honest.
author: John Grant

quote: I was always told that music isn't a 'realistic' path to take, and like a normal human being, I doubted myself over and over because I was afraid of failure.
author: Alessia Cara

quote: The traditional religious right's failure to restore public-school prayer or pass an antiabortion constitutional amendment has likely helped fuel the spread of the more extreme dominionist school.
author: Jon Meacham

quote: A street full of electric light is a sign of civic failure and is an insulting injury to the soul. Shutting out the night is as disastrous as shutting out the light.
author: Michael Leunig

quote: E! has just become a sad, sad place to live. They don't know what they're doing; they have no ideas... everything they do just is a failure.
author: Chelsea Handler

quote: There has been a failure to grasp how competing narratives fight for the attention of angry young Muslims, and we have grossly underestimated the appeal of the jihadist brand.
author: Maajid Nawaz

quote: People never confess to failure. They should.
author: Mo Ibrahim

quote: Increasing extremism - across Africa and the world - must be understood in the context of the failure of our leaders properly to manage diversity within their borders.
author: Mo Ibrahim

quote: I love Rauschenberg. I love that he created a turning point in visual history, that he redefined the idea of beauty, that he combined painting, sculpture, photography, and everyday life with such gall, and that he was interested in, as he put it, 'the ability to conceive failure as progress.'
author: Jerry Saltz

quote: Like Lyndon Johnson, President Obama understands that timidity in a time of troubles is a prescription for failure.
author: Robert Dallek

quote: Vietnam was a palpable failure. And of course, in retrospect, it was even more clearly a disaster and a failure than maybe people understood at the time.
author: Robert Dallek

quote: When people read 'Breitbart' every single day and convince themselves that Barack Obama is a foreign terrorist, that is not a problem of government. That is a problem of community failure, and we have to recognize that.
author: J. D. Vance

quote: We're very good at talking about the individual in American politics and excellent at talking about the government. But we have little ability to even acknowledge everything that exists in the middle, and given how influential politics is on every other part of our life, I think that failure of discourse is pretty corrosive to our overall culture.
author: J. D. Vance

quote: Of course, Third World leaders love you. By ascribing third world ills to First World sins, you absolve them of blame for their countries' failure to advance.
author: John McCarthy

quote: I was in kidney failure. I ended up having a kidney transplant on my 21st birthday.
author: Amy Purdy

quote: The federal government has been a proven failure in picking winners and losers in the energy sector.
author: Mike Pompeo

quote: If terrorists are already on our southern border, a national-security failure has already occurred.
author: Mike Pompeo

quote: A failure to act is a terrible, stunning legacy for any leader. But far worse when it is the president of the United States. And that's the point driven home by Romney's selection of Ryan, who dared to lead when Obama did not.
author: Mark McKinnon

quote: Like prospecting in the 19th century, reconnaissance of the asteroids would of necessity take place in an arena where trouble is likely and help is distant. Heroic stories of individual triumph and failure, set on landscapes never seen by humankind, are in the cards.
author: Seth Shostak

quote: Try not to say, 'I'm a failure.' Instead, ask, 'What can I do better? What did I do wrong?' Then re-approach.
author: Jillian Michaels

quote: Whenever you have a failure or setback, you need to take a step back and find out what you can learn from the scenario. What did you do to contribute to that failure? This way, you can make sure you don't repeat that pattern.
author: Jillian Michaels

quote: What you find when you live in the United States, you live in the West, is that when somebody fails, it's never their fault. They always like to blame somebody other than themselves for a failure.
author: Stephen A. Schwarzman

quote: When I started running cross-country and track in high school, literally every race was a failure.
author: Chad Hurley

quote: I didn't allow failure to break my heart. So I wouldn't allow success to bloat my head.
author: Randeep Hooda

quote: In most parts of the world, starting a company that goes bust is dubbed a 'failure.' In Silicon Valley, we call this 'gaining experience.' We are willing to take the risks that are inherent for innovation.
author: Sebastian Thrun

quote: I've loved every minute I've spent in television. And I've had much more failure, as traditionally measured, than success in television. I've done four shows, and only one of them was the 'West Wing.'
author: Aaron Sorkin

quote: I'm bound to fail when I write in Italian, but unlike my sense of failure in the past, this doesn't torment or grieve me.
author: Jhumpa Lahiri

quote: Failure in the theater is more dramatic and uglier than any other form of writing. It costs so much, you feel so guilty.
author: Lillian Hellman

quote: I can plunk out enough chords to write a song, but I'm completely afraid to play guitar in front of other people. It's a fear of failure, I guess.
author: Mandy Moore

quote: For me, utter failure is to make a film that people pay their money to go see and they don't like.
author: Peter Jackson

quote: I'm quite detached from failure and success. Once a shooting is done, I kind of close that chapter in my life.
author: Ranbir Kapoor

quote: Wherever there's an all-encompassing 'always,' 'all' or 'never' in your life, it's a sign that your mischievous subconscious is setting you up for failure by consistently leading you back toward these repeat performances.
author: Karen Salmansohn

quote: It's failure, really, that you grow by, although nobody likes to experience it.
author: Nick Nolte

quote: While entrepreneurs spend a lot of effort trying to avoid failure, sometimes the lessons one learns from those missteps can be invaluable.
author: Lewis Howes

quote: Before you can win a game, you have to not lose it.
author: Chuck Noll

quote: But while success and failure depend on conditions, the mind neither waxes nor wanes.
author: Bodhidharma

quote: If we can actually decrease the failure rate from nine out of 10 drugs failing in clinical trials and instead have seven out of 10 instead failing, that is a major victory for drug discovery and for people having better therapy.
author: Anne Wojcicki

quote: Capitalism, after all, is no fun when real failure becomes a possibility.
author: James Surowiecki

quote: Solyndra's failure isn't a reason for the government to give up on alternative energy, any more than the failure of Pets.com during the Internet bubble means that venture capital should steer clear of tech projects.
author: James Surowiecki

quote: I feel, in the end, as if everything I've done has been a failure.
author: Jonathan Kozol

quote: I tell young people, including my own kids, don't do this, it's too difficult. It's a career full of rejection, disappointment and failure. It's murderously hard on the ego. Don't become an actor.
author: John Lithgow

quote: When people have a willpower failure, it's because they haven't anticipated a situation that's going to come along.
author: Charles Duhigg

quote: I'm scared of failure so much more than any of the other girls I compete against that I work so much harder than they possibly could. I'm totally down with spiders and frogs and heights and snakes - everything; I'm cool with it.
author: Ronda Rousey

quote: I always write about subjects which attract me because if I didn't, it would be awful, a failure.
author: Ruth Rendell

quote: My roots allow me to let go of the fear of failure.
author: Sissy Spacek

quote: Every large brand has franchisees and stores that don't make it. It's unfortunate, and Cold Stone did everything it could to support its franchisees, but some failure rate is part of the business.
author: Doug Ducey

quote: No one ought to be under any illusion that Cheney privately thinks himself a failure.
author: Barton Gellman

quote: First developed as a weapon by the U.S. Army, VX is an oily, odorless and tasteless liquid that kills on contact with the skin or when inhaled in aerosol form. Like other nerve agents, it is treatable in the first minutes after exposure but otherwise leads swiftly to fatal convulsions and respiratory failure.
author: Barton Gellman

quote: In hindsight, everything in my life looks a little rosy. But the reality is that with, say, 'Swingers,' when we finished, it was considered a total failure.
author: Doug Liman

quote: Failure usually works for me in the end.
author: David Hasselhoff

quote: The only reason my work seems to be eclectic up to a certain period is because I was a failure as an actor.
author: Hugh Grant

quote: The very reasons sometimes that you make a film are the reasons for its failure.
author: Sydney Pollack

quote: I'm sure not afraid of success and I've learned not to be afraid of failure. The only thing I'm afraid of now is of being someone I don't like much.
author: Anna Quindlen

quote: The failure to readily identify the battle between good and evil is a nagging, ongoing, dangerous pattern that shows no sign of easing up any time soon.
author: Mike Gallagher

quote: Well, I think it's too early to call Fallujah a failure.
author: Chuck Schumer

quote: Every company needs to have a skunkworks, to try things that have a high probability of failing. You try to minimize failure, but at the same time, if you're not willing to try things that are inherently risky, you're not going to make progress.
author: Nolan Bushnell

quote: There's no amount of money that makes you feel better when people think of you as a joke or a hack or a failure or ugly or stupid or morally empty.
author: Patrick Stump

quote: I've learned to think in terms of having a long career. Actors can have very long careers that last until the day we die, but there will be moments when you'll feel like you're a failure or when you're disappointed in yourself.
author: Bryce Dallas Howard

quote: I have probably purchased fifty 'hot tips' in my career, maybe even more. When I put them all together, I know I am a net loser.
author: Charles Schwab
